title: Chocolate Chunk Macadamia Brownies
ingredients: ['200g quality plain chocolate, broken into pieces', '250g butter, chopped', '375g dark brown soft sugar', '4 eggs', '5 tablespoons cocoa powder, sifted', '160g plain flour, sifted', '1/4 teaspoon baking powder', '125g quality plain chocolate, broken into pieces', '50g macadamia nuts, halved']
